title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then quickly mix in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice mix, refrigerate for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked.
In a pan, cook tomato puree with cream and spices.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
